code: import{fetchStoreData}from"../../utils/api";export var FETCH_STORE_REQUEST="FETCH_STORE_REQUEST";export var FETCH_STORE_SUCCESS="FETCH_STORE_SUCCESS";export var FETCH_STORE_FAILURE="FETCH_STORE_FAILURE";export var fetchStoreRequest=function fetchStoreRequest(){return{type:FETCH_STORE_REQUEST};};var ActionTypes=/*#__PURE__*/function(ActionTypes){ActionTypes["FETCH_STORE_REQUEST"]="FETCH_STORE_REQUEST";ActionTypes["FETCH_STORE_SUCCESS"]="FETCH_STORE_SUCCESS";ActionTypes["FETCH_STORE_FAILURE"]="FETCH_STORE_FAILURE";ActionTypes["FETCH_CONSTRUCTOR_STORE_REQUEST"]="FETCH_CONSTRUCTOR_STORE_REQUEST";return ActionTypes;}(ActionTypes||{});export var fetchStoreSuccess=function fetchStoreSuccess(data){return{type:ActionTypes.FETCH_STORE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};export var fetchStoreFailure=function fetchStoreFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_STORE_FAILURE,payload:error};};export function getStore(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:FETCH_STORE_REQUEST});fetchStoreData().then(function(res){dispatch(fetchStoreSuccess(res.data));}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(fetchStoreFailure(error));});};}
